summary: A Companion mod I made on 2 May 2013
descriptionHtml:
About The Mod:
=========

The Companion is a level 81 Female Nord Mage in Whiterun.

Installation Notes:
===========

Before installing this mod backup your saves as a safety precaution. 

How To Install The Mod:
==============

Extract the file \"Custom Mage Follower by D3ATHKeeper\" anywhere you like to.

Copy the \"Data\" folder to your Skyrim Dictionary.
If you don\'t know where your Skyrim Dictionary is Right click the Skyrim shortcut and choose the option that says \"Open file location\".

All you have to do now is select the mod in \"Data files\" by launching the Skyrim launcher.
If you can\'t select the \"Data files\" option go to \"Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\" and open the \"SkyrimPrefs.ini\" file and add \"bEnableFileSelection=1\" under \"[Launcher]\"

If you have any bugs feel free to tell me the bug your having in the comment section

Requirements:
=========

The only requirement is the game \"The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\".
author: D3ATHKeeper
